root.name: Contra ReBirth
root.description: Overiew Much like Capcom's Mega Man 9, Contra Rebirth is made in such a way to resemble its 8-bit and 16-bit predecessors. It features many of the iconic Contra weapons, and a co-op mode much like the original Contra. Pricing JapanMay 12th, 2009: 1000 Nintendo Points Europe September 4th, 2009: 1000 Nintendo Points
